    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CombinedInvWrapper
     
    class 
    EmptyHandler
     
    class 
    EntityArmorInvWrapper
    Exposes the armor inventory of an LivingEntity as an IItemHandler using LivingEntity.getItemBySlot(EquipmentSlot) and LivingEntity.setItemSlot(EquipmentSlot, ItemStack).
    class 
    EntityEquipmentInvWrapper
    Exposes the armor or hands inventory of an LivingEntity as an IItemHandler using LivingEntity.getItemBySlot(EquipmentSlot) and LivingEntity.setItemSlot(EquipmentSlot, ItemStack).
    class 
    EntityHandsInvWrapper
    Exposes the hands inventory of an LivingEntity as an IItemHandler using LivingEntity.getItemBySlot(EquipmentSlot) and LivingEntity.setItemSlot(EquipmentSlot, ItemStack).
    class 
    InvWrapper

    PlayerArmorInvWrapper

    PlayerInvWrapper
     
    class 
    PlayerMainInvWrapper
    Exposes the player inventory WITHOUT the armor inventory as IItemHandler.
    class 
    PlayerOffhandInvWrapper
     
    class 
    RangedWrapper
    A wrapper that composes another IItemHandlerModifiable, exposing only a range of the composed slots.
    class
